root.name: Velocity
root.description: OverviewVelocity is a vertically scrolling shoot 'em up with a teleportation twist developed by FuturLab. It features a 50 mission campaign, 20 bonus levels, and music by Killzone composer Joris de Man. It was originally released in May 2012 on PlayStation Minis.Velocity UltraVelocity Ultra is an enhanced version of the game released July 2nd 2013 for the PlayStation Vita. It features enhanced high resolution art in addition to regular PSN features like trophies and leaderboards.
